product.shortDescription: Travel to paradise with this Disney x American Tourister Hardside Carry-On! This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling.

tooltip: Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Disney Pixar Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.headlineDescription:
Feature Highlights:
✓ Pixar printed ABS Hardside
✓ Expands 1.5"
✓ Interior organization

Details:
  • Overall Dimensions: 19.0" x 14.0" x 9.0"
  • Weight: 7.28 lbs

compareSpecifications.name: Overall Height
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The total height of the case including handles and wheels

compareSpecifications.name: Overall Length
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The total length of the case including handles and wheels

compareSpecifications.name: Overall Width
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The total width of the case including handles and wheels

compareSpecifications.name: Internal Height
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The height of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions

compareSpecifications.name: Internal Length
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The length of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions

compareSpecifications.name: Internal Width
compareSpecifications.tooltip: The width of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions

compareSpecifications.name: USB Port
compareSpecifications.tooltip: Built in USB port lets you power devices on the go. Battery sold separately

compareSpecifications.name: Smart Sleeve
compareSpecifications.tooltip: Strap that fits over most upright luggage handles for easy transportation

compareSpecifications.name: TSA Lock
compareSpecifications.tooltip: To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
